Consistently rated as excellent by 285-35r18 drivers

content.body:
### Shop 285/35R18 Tire Size
What kinds of vehicles use the 285/35R18 tire size? That would be Mercedes-Benz vehicles such as the C63 AMG, CLS550, SL400, or the Lotus Esprit, and a new version of any of these might’ve rolled out of the factory with a set of Michelin Pilot Super Sport, Continental ContiProContact, [Pirelli P Zero Nero All Season](https://simpletire.com/brands/pirelli-tires/p-zero-nero-all-season), or Pirelli P Zero Rosso Asimmetrico tires attached.

Popular vehicles
2018-2021 Mercedes-Benz C63 AMG
2007-2018 Mercedes-Benz CLS550
2015-2016 Mercedes-Benz SL400
2004-2009 Mercedes-Benz SL600
1997-2004 Lotus Esprit

Most drivers use all-season tires thanks to their ability to perform year-round, and some all-season tires even offer ultra-high-performance. Consider the Continental ExtremeContact DWS06 PLUS, Toyo Proxes Sport A/S, and [Hankook Ventus S1 Noble2 (H452)](https://simpletire.com/brands/hankook-tires/ventus-s1-noble2-h452) if you want a set of all-season tires that offers year-round traction and sporty handling.

Designed for use in warmer weather, ultra-high-performance tires bring out the sporty handling and quick acceleration and braking of your ride. Check out the Bridgestone Potenza Sport, [Yokohama Advan Sport V105](https://simpletire.com/brands/yokohama-tires/advan-sport-v105), and Sumitomo HTR Z5 if you’re booking for a set of 285/35R18 tires that can help you push the envelope, just be sure to change them when temperatures are consistently below 45 degrees Fahrenheit.

Whether you drive a Mercedes-Benz CLS55, Lotus Esprit, or something else, SimpleTire has a set of 285/35R18 tires that meets your needs at a great price!

info.title: Did you know?
info.body: A reliable brand is the #1 ask for most drivers. Here you can shop all the most popular brands and discover new ones – all tested, ranked and rated by our customers.
